name: urbane
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of a man) confident, comfortable, and polite in social situations: Herschel was an urbane, kindly, and generous man. Synonym
polished

having an understanding of the world and showing experience and confidence: urbane conversation/pleasures His urbane manners impressed me.
